resources.string: You can use PasswordReminder to keep your passwords in a safe place and to be not have to remember.
To keep your passwords safe, you must set a master password to prevent other people to see your password
You can add a password by tapping to plus button in right bottom of the page and select the category, then you can fill all the fields and click the button.
You can see a password by tapping on a password from list. For security reasons, your password appears and disappears after 5 seconds.
Basically, long tap on a password, then you will see a dialog. Just tap on yes button.
Please set a master password to keep your passwords safe.
Please enter your master password to see your passwords.
Do you want to delete this password?
There is no password in device accounts.
There is no password in email accounts.
There is no password in social media accounts.
Password was copied to your clipboard.
Master password that you entered is wrong, you have 4 chances left.
Master password that you entered is wrong, you have 3 chances left.
Master password that you entered is wrong, you have 2 chances left.
Master password that you entered is wrong, you have 1 chances left.
Master password that you entered is wrong, your password datas were deleted permanently for security reasons.
Because of you entered wrong passwords contuniously, your passwords was deleted. You cannot login again. Application is closing.
